title: Fly Peewee fly (A)
creator_credit: Film Australia, SBS Independent, Adrienne Parr and Sally Riley
brief_description: A young Aboriginal boy, Robbie is in the midst of the conflict between his father and his grandmother. Robbie’s grandmother is white and wants to give Robbie every advantage, while Robbie’s aboriginal father is searching for his own identity and place. A warm story about fragile but meaningful family relationships.
